thread.title: West Virginia agency sets cyber security conference
thread.title_full: West Virginia agency sets cyber security conference

title: West Virginia agency sets cyber security conference
text:
West Virginia agency sets conference to provide residents information on cyber security 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 10/20/15 2:51 am EDT - Updated: 10/20/15 2:51 am EDT 
CHARLESTON, West Virginia â€” West Virginia's technology agency is sponsoring a cyber security conference for state residents. 
The meeting is set for 9 a.m. until 1 p.m. Wednesday at the Charleston Civic Center. A panel of experts will provide information on cyber threats and effective ways to safeguard computer information. The presentations will touch on individual responsibility, accountability, risk management and privacy issues. 
The event is free, but those who want to attend or view a live webcast of the presentations must pre-register online. 
Registration and information: 
https://www.eventbrite.com/e/2015-west-virginia-cyber-security-conference-tickets-17607020071
